title.en: FromThe Guru’s Heart Practice: The Wish-Fulfilling Jewel

text.en: Emaho! In Dewachen, ‘Blissful’ pure realm of the west,
text.en-trans: emaho, nubchok dewachen gyi zhingkham su

text.en: Amitābha’s compassionate blessing was aroused,
text.en-trans: nangwa tayé tukjé jinlab yö

text.en: And he blessed his emanation, Padmasambhava,
text.en-trans: tulku pemajungné jinlab té

text.en: To come into this world to bring benefit to all beings.
text.en-trans: dzambüling du drowé dön la jön

text.en: Compassionate one, you never cease to bring us help and well-being:
text.en-trans: dro dön gyün ché mepé tukjé chen

text.en: To the Lotus-born Guru of Orgyen, we pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen pemajungné la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing, so all our wishes be spontaneously fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa lhün gyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: All the Dharma Kings, from Tri Songdetsen
text.en-trans: gyalpo trisong detsen menché né

text.en: Down to the very end of the royal line,
text.en-trans: chögyal dung gyü ta la matongwar

text.en: Throughout past, present, and future, know your constant blessing.
text.en-trans: dü sum gyün ché mepar jingyi lob

text.en: One and only friend of Tibet’s Dharma Kings,
text.en-trans: bö kyi chökyong gyalpö nyen chikpu

text.en: Compassionate one, you safeguard the lands that practise Dharma:
text.en-trans: gyalpo chöchö kyongwé tukjé chen

text.en: To the Lotus-born Guru of Orgyen, we pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen pemajungné la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing, so all our wishes be spontaneously fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa lhün gyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: While your wisdom body subjugates the rakṣasas in the south-west,
text.en-trans: ku ni lhonub sinpö kha nön dzé

text.en: You look on sentient beings everywhere with compassion,
text.en-trans: tukjé bö kyi semchen yong la zik

text.en: Magnificent guide for sentient beings led astray by ignorance,
text.en-trans: marik lokpé semchen drenpé pal

text.en: Skilfully you teach them, with their emotions so difficult to tame.
text.en-trans: nyönmong dul ké semchen tab kyi dul

text.en: Compassionate one, your love is constant in its kindness and care:
text.en-trans: tsé dung gyün ché mepé tukjé chen

text.en: To the Lotus-born Guru of Orgyen, we pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen pemajungné la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing, so all our wishes be spontaneously fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa lhün gyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: Now, when this degenerate dark age reaches its final depths,
text.en-trans: dü ngen nyikmé ta la tukpé tsé

text.en: At dawn and at dusk you come, for those who have devotion,
text.en-trans: nang ré gong ré bö kyi dön la jön

text.en: Riding on the rays of the rising and the setting sun,
text.en-trans: nyizer char dü dang la chib té jön

text.en: And on every tenth day of the waxing moon, you come in person.
text.en-trans: yarngo tsé chü dak la ngö su jön

text.en: Compassionate one, you act with vast power to help beings:
text.en-trans: dro dön tobchen dzepé tukjé chen

text.en: To the Lotus-born Guru of Orgyen, we pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen pemajungné la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing, so all our wishes be spontaneously fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa lhün gyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: Now in this dark age, the age of conflict, the final era of five hundred years,
text.en-trans: ngabgyé tama tsödü nyikma la

text.en: The five poisons of the negative emotions grow more violent in all sentient beings—
text.en-trans: semchen tamché nyönmong duk nga rak

text.en: Recklessly we indulge in destructive emotions, and let the poisons dominate our minds.
text.en-trans: nyönmong duk nga rang gyü chö pé tsé

text.en: At a time like this, let your compassion be our refuge and protection.
text.en-trans: dendré dü na dak dré tukjé kyob

text.en: Compassionate one, you lead those with devotion to the higher realms:
text.en-trans: deden tori drenpé tukjé chen

text.en: To the Lotus-born Guru of Orgyen, we pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen pemajungné la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing, so all our wishes be spontaneously fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa lhün gyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: When terrifying armies of oppression encircle us,
text.en-trans: hor sok jikpé mak gi ta kor né

text.en: Menacing the great centres of the Dharma with destruction,
text.en-trans: chökhor nyenpo jik la tukpé tsé

text.en: With no trace of doubt or hesitation we pray:
text.en-trans: yinyi tetsom mepar solwa deb

text.en: O Guru Rinpoche, with your retinue of eight classes of gods and demons,
text.en-trans: guru lhasin dé gyé khor dang ché

text.en: You will repel aggressors and their armies—of this we have no doubt!
text.en-trans: hor sok makpung dokpar tetsom mé

text.en: To the Lotus-born Guru of Orgyen, we pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen pemajungné la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing, so all our wishes be spontaneously fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa lhün gyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: When sickness strikes, to destroy the fragile bodies of sentient beings,
text.en-trans: semchen gyulü jikpé né jung tsé

text.en: When diseases plunge us into unbearable suffering and agony,
text.en-trans: mi zö dukngal né kyi nyenpa na

text.en: With no trace of doubt or hesitation we pray:
text.en-trans: yinyi tetsom mepar solwa deb

text.en: O Guru Rinpoche, embodiment of the Buddha of Medicine,
text.en-trans: guru men gyi la dang yermé bé

text.en: You will remove the obstacles that bring untimely death!
text.en-trans: tsé zé mayin barché ngepar sel

text.en: To the Lotus-born Guru of Orgyen, we pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen pemajungné la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing, so all our wishes be spontaneously fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa lhün gyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: When nature turns against us, and earth’s resources fail;
text.en-trans: jungwa drar lang sachü nyampé tsé

text.en: When sentient beings are tormented by the plague of famine,
text.en-trans: semchen mugé né kyi nyenpa na

text.en: With no trace of doubt or hesitation we pray:
text.en-trans: yinyi tetsom mepar solwa deb

text.en: O Guru Rinpoche, with all your ḍākinīs and deities of prosperity,
text.en-trans: guru khandro norlhé tsok dangché

text.en: You will dispel all poverty, all hunger and thirst—of this we have no doubt.
text.en-trans: ulpong trekom selwar tetsom mé

text.en: To the Lotus-born Guru of Orgyen, we pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen pemajungné la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing, so all our wishes be spontaneously fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa lhün gyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: When the destined revealers retrieve hidden treasures for the benefit of beings,
text.en-trans: lechen drowé döndu ter dön na

text.en: In the courage and confidence of a samaya free of all pretence,
text.en-trans: damtsik zolzok mepé pading gi

text.en: With no trace of doubt or hesitation we pray:
text.en-trans: yinyi tetsom mepar solwa deb

text.en: O Guru Rinpoche, inseparable from our yidam deity,
text.en-trans: guru yidam lha dang yermé pé

text.en: You will ensure the true heirs receive their father’s treasure—of this we have no doubt.
text.en-trans: pa nor bu yi lönpar tetsom mé

text.en: To the Lotus-born Guru of Orgyen, we pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen pemajungné la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing, so all our wishes be spontaneously fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa lhün gyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: When travelling through hidden lands, forests and deserted places,
text.en-trans: bé yul naktrö wen sa nyokpé tsé

text.en: When our way is blocked and we are cut off by storms, by rain and snow,
text.en-trans: khachar buyuk tsub shing lam gak na

text.en: With no trace of doubt or hesitation we pray:
text.en-trans: yinyi tetsom mepar solwa deb

text.en: O Guru Rinpoche, surrounded by mighty local spirits,
text.en-trans: guru zhidak nyenpö khor dang ché

text.en: You will lead us practitioners to the right path—of this we have no doubt!
text.en-trans: chödzé lam na drenpar tetsom mé

text.en: To the Lotus-born Guru of Orgyen, we pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen pemajungné la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing, so all our wishes be spontaneously fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa lhün gyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: When vicious wild animals menace us—tigers, leopards, bears and poisonous snakes,
text.en-trans: tak zik dom dré dukdrul chewachen

text.en: On our way through terrifying passes, wild and desolate places,
text.en-trans: drok chen jikpé trang la drimpé tsé

text.en: With no trace of doubt or hesitation we pray:
text.en-trans: yinyi tetsom mepar solwa deb

text.en: O Guru Rinpoche, along with your gings, warriors and protectors,
text.en-trans: guru pawo ging dang sungmar ché

text.en: You will drive off these ferocious creatures—of this we have no doubt!
text.en-trans: dukpé semchen tröpar tetsom mé

text.en: To the Lotus-born Guru of Orgyen, we pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen pemajungné la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing, so all our wishes be spontaneously fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa lhün gyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: When obstacles arise in earth, water, fire and air
text.en-trans: sa chu mé lung jungwé barché kyi

text.en: To threaten these illusory bodies of ours with destruction,
text.en-trans: gyulü yarpo jik la thukpé tsé

text.en: With no trace of doubt or hesitation we pray:
text.en-trans: yinyi tetsom mepar solwa deb

text.en: O Guru Rinpoche, with the goddesses of the four elements,
text.en-trans: guru jungwa zhi yi lhamor ché

text.en: You will harmonize the elements into their natural state—of this we have no doubt!
text.en-trans: jungwa rang sar zhiwar tetsom mé

text.en: To the Lotus-born Guru of Orgyen, we pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen pemajungné la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing, so all our wishes be spontaneously fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa lhün gyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: When travelling on dangerous routes,
text.en-trans: lamsang jikpé trang la drimpé tsé

text.en: If murderous bandits and robbers attack us,
text.en-trans: sé khyer jakpa chompö nyenpa na

text.en: With no trace of doubt or hesitation we pray:
text.en-trans: yinyi tetsom mepar solwa deb

text.en: O Guru Rinpoche, through your realization of the four mudrās,
text.en-trans: guru chakgya zhi yi gongpar den

text.en: You will dispel the terror of all brutality and greed.
text.en-trans: tsau ra migö ngam sem lakpar jé

text.en: To the Lotus-born Guru of Orgyen, we pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen pemajungné la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing, so all our wishes be spontaneously fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa lhün gyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: When faced by killers on all sides,
text.en-trans: gangzhik shemé mak gi ta kor né

text.en: Who threaten us with lethal weapons,
text.en-trans: tsöncha nönpö deb shing nyenpa na

text.en: With no trace of doubt or hesitation we pray:
text.en-trans: yinyi tetsom mepar solwa deb

text.en: O Guru Rinpoche, the protection of your vajra tent
text.en-trans: guru dorjé gur dang denpa yi

text.en: Will cause killers to panic and weapons to be scattered.
text.en-trans: shema dré ching tsöncha torwar gyur

text.en: To the Lotus-born Guru of Orgyen, we pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen pemajungné la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing, so all our wishes be spontaneously fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa lhün gyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: When this lifespan is exhausted, and we come to die,
text.en-trans: namzhik tsé zé chiwé dü jung tsé

text.en: If we are racked by the intense anguish and pain of dying,
text.en-trans: né chö dukngal dü trö nyenpa na

text.en: With no trace of doubt or hesitation we pray:
text.en-trans: yinyi tetsom mepar solwa deb

text.en: O Guru Rinpoche, as you are the emanation of Buddha Amitābha,
text.en-trans: guru nangwa tayé trulpa té

text.en: It is certain we will be born in ‘The Blissful’ pure realm of Dewachen:
text.en-trans: dewachen gyi zhing du ngepar kyé

text.en: To the Lotus-born Guru of Orgyen, we pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen pemajungné la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing, so all our wishes be spontaneously fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa lhün gyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: Once this borrowed and illusory body is destroyed
text.en-trans: gyulü yarpo zhikpé bardo ru

text.en: In the bardo state when our deluded experiences, and our further delusions, arise to make us suffer,
text.en-trans: trulnang nying trul dukngal nyenpa na

text.en: With no trace of doubt or hesitation we pray:
text.en-trans: yinyi tetsom mepar solwa deb

text.en: O Guru Rinpoche, you who know past, present and future, through your compassion,
text.en-trans: guru dü sum khyenpé tukjé yi

text.en: You will let all delusion be self-liberated—of this we have no doubt!
text.en-trans: trulnang rang sar drolwar tetsom mé

text.en: To the Lotus-born Guru of Orgyen, we pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen pemajungné la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing, so all our wishes be spontaneously fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa lhün gyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: When we are overwhelmed by karma and circumstance,
text.en-trans: zhenyang lé dang kyen gyi wang gyur té

text.en: And suffer through grasping at delusion as real,
text.en-trans: trulnang ngöpor zhen ching dukngal na

text.en: With no trace of doubt or hesitation we pray:
text.en-trans: yinyi tetsom mepar solwa deb

text.en: O Guru Rinpoche, King of Great Bliss,
text.en-trans: guru dechen gyalpö ngowo té

text.en: You will utterly destroy the delusions that bring suffering.
text.en-trans: dukngal trulpa tsené zhikpar jé

text.en: To the Lotus-born Guru of Orgyen, we pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen pemajungné la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing, so all our wishes be spontaneously fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa lhün gyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: When beings of all six realms are tormented by immense pain,
text.en-trans: dro druk dukngal chenpö nyenpa dang

text.en: And especially when our leaders and people are engulfed in suffering,
text.en-trans: khyepar bö kyi jebang dukngal na

text.en: With intense longing and devotion, from the depths of our hearts,
text.en-trans: dé gü möpé dungshuk drakpo yi

text.en: With no trace of doubt or hesitation we pray:
text.en-trans: yinyi tetsom mepar solwa deb

text.en: O Guru Rinpoche, with your unchanging, unwavering compassion—watch over us!
text.en-trans: guru tukjé pogyur mepar zik

text.en: To the Lotus-born Guru of Orgyen, we pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen pemajungné la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing, so all our wishes be spontaneously fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa lhün gyi drubpar jingyi lob
